message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but $130 is a bit steep for me. How about $115?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $122?
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit high.  $120 is the most I can do right now.
